title: Log
description: A Log entry in a report

file.description: The pathname of the manifest file which triggered the log message.

line.description: The line number in the manifest file which triggered the log message.

source.description: The origin of the log message. This could be a resource, a property of a resource, or the string 'Puppet'.

tags.description: The strings with which the source is tagged

time.description: When the message was sent. In ISO 8601 format with 9 characters second-fragment
